Package com.panviva.util.pgc.rule

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IElement  
    IElementType  
    IMatchProperties  
    IRule
    Interface defining all the rule transforms applied to the common object model document.
    IRuleSet
    Interface defining a rule set and its operations
    IRuleSubType  
    IRuleTarget  
    IRuleTargetType  
    IRuleType  
    ITask
    Interface defining a task and getters and setters for its properties
    ITaskExprType  
    ITaskJoinType  
    ITaskMatchType  
    ITaskPosition  
    ITaskType  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HtmlElement
    Class to manage the details of an Html element to added as part of a create transform to the common object model document.
    MatchProperties
    Implementation class of the IMatchProperties interface.
    PartitionSrcProperties  
    PartitionTargetProperties
    This class is used set conditional match properties for a rule of type partition for a target_path task.
    Rule
    This class models the fundamental components of a rule or transform.
    RuleSet
    A container class that houses a list of rules and provides convenience methods to manage the rule set.
    RuleSetManager
    This class manages the loading, parsing and housing of a set of rules.
    Task
    Class to manage the details of a task within a rule.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HtmlElementType
    Enumeration detailing the components that can be added to the common object document inside a create transform.
    RuleSubType
    An enumerated type describing different rule sub types.
    RuleTarget
    An enumerated type listing end target for a rule.
    RuleTargetType
    An enumerated type describing the different document types supported.
    RuleType
    An enumerated type describing the different types of rules supported by the converter.
    TaskExprType
    An enumerated type describing the different types expressions used in a task match element.
    TaskJoinType
    An enumerated type describing boolean operations that can be used to join tasks.
    TaskMatchType
    An enumerated type describing the different types of match operations within a task.
    TaskPosition
    An enumerated type describing different positions source nodes can be created, copied to or moved relative to a target.
    TaskType
    Enumerated type describing the different types of task.
